title: PA-STEM-Based Simulation Education for Solving Social Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, foundational scientific knowledge for social issues, and VR equipment experience
context.additional_context: Learners experience real-world social issues (e.g., urban planning, disaster response) via VR simulations in BYOD environments and develop integrated problem-solving competencies through peer assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply integrated STEM knowledge to analyze given social issues in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can improve their problem-solving solutions by three or more stages based on peer assessment feedback.
Learners can enhance critical thinking skills by conducting rubric-based evaluations of peers' work during collaborative processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
